document_title: Intestinal infections: Symptoms, causes and prevention
subsection_content:
Intestinal infection is a condition in which damage to the digestive tract occurs due to the invasion of harmful microorganisms. This disease can appear in anyone, at any time, leading to many uncomfortable and inconvenient problems. If the infection is not treated promptly, there is a risk that it will lead to more serious health complications.
Invasion of harmful microorganisms leads to intestinal infection
